Name: cryolite production | cryolite | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
Description: Production by the hydrofluoric acid technique. In a first step, alumina trihydrate is leached by hydrofluoric acid - in the second step cryolite is precipitated by adding sodium hydroxide. The overall process yield is of 98%. Inventory bases on stoechiometric calculations. The emissions to air (0.2 wt.% of HF input) and water were estimated using mass balance.
